Manufacture in which all the materials used are classified in a heading other than that of the product

 or

 Manufacture from cotton cloth already made up in a form ready for use of [heading 9401](/headings/9401) or [heading 9403](/headings/9403) , provided:

 * its value does not exceed 25% of the ex-works price of the product,
* all the other materials used are already originating and are classified in a heading other than [heading 9401](/headings/9401) or [heading 9403](/headings/9403)
